snippet: A Bronx woman, Holly Van Voast, in court on a summons that she stripped naked in Grand Central Terminal, exposed herself to the judge and others.
lead_paragraph: A Bronx woman, Holly Van Voast, in court on a summons that she stripped naked in Grand Central Terminal, exposed herself to the judge and others.

headline.main: In Court for Disrobing, and Doing It Again
headline.print_headline: In Court for Disrobing, and Doing It Again
headline.seo: Answering a Summons on Disrobing, and Disrobing in Court
